post.title: Thank you to clone!
post.body: the blog protected to fight spam in comment by proof of work in sha256 using vanityhash self in commandline: `vanityhash -d sha256 -b 32 0000000` enter copy your comment desired to teminal after validate command and press three times to ctrl-d, one times found by the program copy the first column to the second field and you can post your comment, you can also custom.
